review.findings: Compaction gate over-triggering fix: (1) confirmed promotion requires lexical evidence — burst_no_prompt+no_causation alone cannot confirm. (2) 5s chunk-inactivity decay timer resets state when stream goes quiet, re-arms on every chunk. (3) MAX_COMPACTION_DEFER_MS reduced 30s→8s. Reviewer verified timer lifecycle leak-free, all state transitions covered, no regressions to real compaction detection. Analyst confirmed chunk-inactivity patch addresses premature-clear risk. 100 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
